english.segment1: Verse 1: We are dry and thirsty. Lord, we need a saturation. A time of refreshing. Let Your Glory rain down. Let it fill us to running over, running over
english.segment2: CHORUS: Open up the gates. Flood us with Your rain. Manifest Your Glory Lord. We're thirsty for downpour
english.segment3: Verse 2: We can see the rain clouds. As they gather overhead. We're ready to see them break. Send us living water. Let it fill us to running over, running over
english.segment4: Vamp: Say Yes (4x). Rain down in this place
english.segment5: And fill us to. Running over (6x). (back to chorus)
